text: Adam Carson (unknown - 1935) was a Scottish footballer who played as a forward. He played for Glasgow Thistle, Newton Heath, Ardwick and Liverpool during the 1890s. ==External links== *Profile at StretfordEnd.co.uk *Profile at MUFCInfo.com Category:Scottish footballers Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Manchester City F.C. players Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Thistle F.C. players Category:Year of birth missing Category:1935 deaths Category:Association football forwards
title: Adam Carson (footballer)
